title: Analyze Production Log
description: A well is producing more water than expected. An engineer runs a production log (PLT) to determine which perforated interval is producing the unwanted water.

tasks.description: Run the PLT tool in the well, which measures flow rate, fluid density, and water holdup at different depths.
tasks.expected_outcome: A complete set of production log data is acquired over the reservoir interval.

tasks.description: Analyze the log data to create a profile of where oil, gas, and water are entering the wellbore.
tasks.expected_outcome: The analysis clearly shows that the bottom-most set of perforations is producing 100% water.

tasks.description: Recommend a workover to set a plug to shut off the water-producing perforations.
tasks.expected_outcome: A workover recommendation is created to isolate the water zone and improve the well's oil cut.
